content: J, keep it simple but varied-diversify. Writing has become subjective and plural (Ecc. 12) so make a left, a right, go straight, etc. We need (& want) tips but we also need depth-that is to be moved, rattled, as Bond man says «shaken, not stirred». I remember a pastor once saying to me he was running out of sermons. I repeat to you what I said to him-Never mind foggy-bottom thinking, swing for the bleachers. Life awaits there.
